I had a similar problem with jasperreport and resolved the problem by patching my "junit.jar".
I've added the classes used by jasperreport in
the "excluded.properties" in the jar.
More info on  <http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#running_8> http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#running_8
 
Bart
 
BTW : This is the third time I'm replying . Last 2 times I used the web form and the replies did not appear .
Are there any filters before publishing ?
